div.p: Hi my name is Linda Bell; I'm the director of the access program at the Easton Area campus.
We're located just off routes 33 and 22 in Bethlehem Township.
Our facility consists of 9 class rooms and they are smart class rooms so we're state
of the art technology, two computer labs and two conference rooms.
We pretty much offer all of the services offered at main campus, things like academic advising,
tutoring, book store facility and financial aid services.
Our staff is ready and willing to help with any questions you may have
so I invite you to stop by and visit.
